005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapKey;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.HashMap;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Map;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * Implements the XPath 3.1
029 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-put">map:put</a>
030 * function.
031 */
032public final class MapPut {
033  private static final String NAME = "put";
034  @NonNull
035  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
036      .name(NAME)
037      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
038      .deterministic()
039      .contextIndependent()
040      .focusIndependent()
041      .argument(IArgument.builder()
042          .name("map")
043          .type(IMapItem.class)
044          .one()
045          .build())
046      .argument(IArgument.builder()
047          .name("key")
048          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
049          .one()
050          .build())
051      .argument(IArgument.builder()
052          .name("value")
053          .type(IItem.class)
054          .zeroOrMore()
055          .build())
056      .returnType(IMapItem.class)
057      .returnOne()
058      .functionHandler(MapPut::execute)
059      .build();
060
061  private MapPut() {
062    // disable construction
063  }
064
065  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
066  @NonNull
067  private static <V extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
068      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
069      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
070      IItem focus) {
071    IMapItem<V> map = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
072    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
073    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
074    V value = (V) ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2)).toCollectionValue();
075
076    return put(map, key, value).asSequence();
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
081   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-put">map:put</a>.
082   *
083   * @param <V>
084   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
085   * @param map
086   *          the map of Metapath items that is to be modified
087   * @param key
088   *          the key for the value to add to the map
089   * @param value
090   *          the value to add to the map
091   * @return the modified map
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  public static <V extends ICollectionValue> IMapItem<V> put(
095      @NonNull IMapItem<V> map,
096      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key,
097      @NonNull V value) {
098    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
099    Map<IMapKey, V> copy = new HashMap<>(map);
100    copy.put(key.asMapKey(), value);
101
102    return IMapItem.ofCollection(copy);
103  }
104}
